message:
"Mechanism of Change"

In the heart of Paris, the tariff tolls thrice,
Downsizing giants for a cleaner guise,
Justice leaves its print on smoky trails,
In richest wheels, the world's salvation lies.
prompt: Paris mayor plans to triple SUV parking tariffs to cut air pollution Paris intends to triple parking charges for large sports utility vehicles (SUVs) in order to push them out of the city and limit emissions and air pollution, the mayor has said. “It is a form of social justice,” Anne Hidalgo announced on Friday of the plan to deliberately target the richest drivers to tackle the climate breakdown and air pollution. “This is about
